release dates: USA::6 January 2018                            (New York City, New York)
imdb.plot outline: A castaway pirate struggles to escape an uninhabited island with his loot, a stash of pickle jars and a notorious monkey goddess statue. Unlikely trials and mishaps thwart a pirate's attempts to escape his predicament of isolation on an uninhabited island. Central to his failed attempts is the unlikely monkey goddess statue who suddenly springs to life. A face-off between the pair escalates to the highest level when the pirate shoots the monkey, but the monkey won't die. Instead, he attacks the pirate again and again. From here, new events unfold as we meet new animal characters and places on this enormous island. Eventually, a friendship develops between the monkey and pirate ahead of their endless misadventures and foolery.
imdb.title: Islandstories Picaroon & Pinkey 2016
